title: Amazon Essentials Long-Sleeve Polo Shirt for Men, Slim Fit Pique
description: SLIM FIT DESIGN: Experience slim fit with our men's polo shirt, tailored through the shoulders, chest, and waist
COMFORT: Crafted from 100% Cotton Pique, this men's long-sleeve polo shirt offer a soft feel and natural stretch, allowing for comfort and breathability
STYLE: Our long-sleeve polo shirt can be layered or worn solo for a comfortable and refined look
THOUGHTFUL DETAILS: This pique polo shirt features a flat knit rib trim at the collar and sleeve openings, plus a two-button placket and straight hem with side vents for ease of movement
FABRIC: Our men's polo shirts long-sleeve are made from tightly knit pique for durability and natural breathability

Discover a blend of comfort and style with our Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve Pique Polo. These long-sleeve collared shirts for men offer a sleek, slim fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist. Crafted from 100% Cotton pique, these men's long-sleeve shirts offer a soft hand feel, natural stretch, and breathability. Suitable for pairing with your favorite chino pants or jeans, our men's pique polo shirts work for both transitional weather and everyday wear. The flat knit rib trim at the collar and sleeve openings, along with a two-button placket, makes these men's slim fit shirts both comfortable and refined. Equipped with side vents at the straight bottom hem, these polo shirts men allow for comfortable movement
